scripts.before:push: yarn test && yarn lint && yarn typedoc
scripts.version:patch: yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks && yarn workspaces run version:patch
scripts.version:minor: yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks && yarn workspaces run version:minor
scripts.version:major: yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version --no-commit-hooks && yarn workspaces run version:major
